channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No working lights, 5th March
item.description:
In area of new building site, roads often dangerous due to mud. Issue at least 3 days now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): National Grid Pylon Zfb 013 Adjoining A40 Layby Cheltenham Road East, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath Strewn with Rubbish due to fly tipping, 5th March
item.description:
The location is the footpath in the AONB that runs from Cleeve Common Road - entrance to Old Quarry and meets up with and part of the Cotswold Way. Due to flytipping around this area, which Tewkesbury Council have collected up - the path away from the tip sites has become strewn with assorted rubbish which really needs a good clear up along its length please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bathtub, 5th March
item.description:
Another thing dumped the day after the other load was collected

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 Swindon Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement needs cleaning, 4th March
item.description:
The whole path between nunney close and meadow close has a huge amount of cigarette buds and rubbish. Making it dangerous for young children when walking. It needs to be cleared up as it has got extremely bad over the last couple of weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Meadow Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped matress, 4th March
item.description:
Mattress on the verge at the side of the road along this stretch. It's on the side heading towards Hucclecote.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 4th March
item.description:
Street light out for 1 to 2 weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Bibury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 3rd March
item.description:
In road opposite alley. Near safety rail.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 347 Innsworth Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip of an inflatable pond / paddle pool, 3rd March
item.description:
The location is on the Cleeve Common Road in the layby / passing place by the entrance to the Sabrina Way Byway on the right hand side going towards the common. In the area is the above item together with other material - cardboard and car parts. Please can they be cleared up as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge dumped in the cloisters, 3rd March
item.description:
Fridge has been dumped in corner of the cloisters
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Cloisters, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least three big potholes in Hearne Road charlton Kings, 3rd March
item.description:
A long time!!! An accident is bound to happen!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Buckles Close, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary bus stop, 3rd March
item.description:
There is a metal framed temporary bus stop notice outside houses 206-208a Hatherley Road on a narrow pavement. This has never been used as a bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 213 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Potholes in College Baths Road, 2nd March
item.description:
The potholes in College Baths Road have been there since last year & are getting progressively worse. They are particularly dangerous for cyclists who have to ride towards oncoming traffic to avoid them or dismount.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Murvagh Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several deep potholes along this short stretch of road dangerous to cyclists now that schools are returning, 2nd March
item.description:
Perviously reported but still no action
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Hearne Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crater, 2nd March
item.description:
There is a super deep pothole looks like it is down to the base layer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Norwood Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Previous pothole continuing to grow, 2nd March
item.description:
Previous pothole recently patched. but now getting larger and edge from join to repair has deteriorated further creating large pothole
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Caernarvon Road, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 or 5 huge potholes in the road, 2nd March
item.description:
From helens close junction up to the primary school. Loads of huge potholes. Present for at least 3 month
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 The Homestead Springbank Road, Cheltenham
